mapper.insert: insert into iot_appointment(client_id, name, excute_time, command, create_time) values (#{clientId}, #{name}, #{excuteTime}, #{command}, now())
mapper.select: select a.`id`, a.`client_id`, a.`name`, a.`excute_time`, a.`command`, a.`status`, a.`create_time`, a.`update_time`, b.`gateway_id`,b.`name` as clientName,b.`last_link_time`, c.`name` as gatewayName,c.`address` from iot_appointment a left join iot_client b on a.`client_id` = b.`id` left join iot_gateway c on b.`gateway_id` = c.`id` where date_format(a.`excute_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and a.`status` = 1
